module.name: System Dashboard
module.description: Provides a system information dashboard, showing information about Calls, CPU, Memory, Disks, Network, and processes.
module.changelog: *14.0.14* FREEPBX-22195 incorrect speed display should be kB/s *14.0.13* FREEPBX-22122 change teh value by default, and the tooltips in advanced settings *14.0.12* FREEPBX-22122 Recent move of Intrusion Detection, causes false failure on dashboard *14.0.11* Packaging of ver 14.0.11 *14.0.10* bump *14.0.9* Fixing FREEI-1401 *14.0.8* FREEPBX-19926 *14.0.7* Add job class *14.0.6.1-2* Clear output buffers so live network usage is more accurate *14.0.6* FREEPBX-19466 Move live network graph away from running background daemon *14.0.5.2* Require framework that has caching *14.0.5.1* Keep more historical data *14.0.5* Reduce amount of database interactions per system query *14.0.4.4* FREEPBX-19052 add back sleep to dashboard scheduler *14.0.4.3* FFREEPBX-18939 *14.0.4.2* Based on comments from PaulGLatour modify the lock to use Symfony locks *14.0.4.1* Clear cache on installation *14.0.4* Change RSS engine *14.0.3.3* FREEPBX-16644 - provide compatibility with FreeBSD *14.0.3.2* FREEPBX-16654 - Exim returns nothing when no email queued *14.0.3.1* FREEPBX-16108 - remove debugging, FREEPBX-16595 - Capture stderr *14.0.3* Add mail queue stats *14.0.2.5* FREEPBX-16001 Remove debugging *14.0.2.4* FREEPBX-15092 *14.0.2.3* FREEPBX-14939 Longpoll flag *14.0.2.2* Merge from 13 *14.0.2.1* Add live network stats *14.0.1* Inital Release
